resources.string: The best android implementation of material UI components. This app implemented based on Google Design Guidelines.

It is known that mathematics is a course that countless people struggle with on all levels.
 Because it is based on logical reasoning that can seldom be achieved through memorization, a lot of people fail to comprehend the underlying concepts and formulas.
 Past 10 years Aakash has helped students with the basics of mathematics like Algebra, Trigonometry, Calculus, Probability, etc.
 With Experience in teaching across India, understanding and maintaining an open mind to cultural differences and clearing NDA exam has enabled him to prepare a course that fits the requirement of every individual student. His Interests include Reading, Teaching, Playing Chess, etc.
 it is necessary to teach students how to leverage their resourcefulness when it comes to solving problems. 
Following the similar approach Courses are made at
